duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the MAC team with activations/deactivations, installations, relocations, and upgrades of equipment.
Perform port activations, deactivations, creating or extending VLANs, creating or extending VPN Routing and Forwarding, and site to site VPNs.
Respond, coordinate, and manage all Change Requests (CRQs) for additions, removals and modifications to the Government Furnished Equipment (GFE) maintenance coverage.
Implement and comply with all Government-approved policies and processes for hardware, software, and documentation change management.
Prepare a monthly summary report of Moves, Adds and Changes performed.
Participate in lessons-learned reviews/documentation, continuous improvement and special projects as required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in a related technical discipline, or the equivalent combination of education, technical training or work experience and zero to two years of related engineering experience.
